answers.answer: Why is dialysis not discussed? most people with renal disease  have started  dialysis at this point, and well BEFORE a transplant..many do not  get a transplant before they go thru time on D…there is a lot of compliance needed before any patient is trusted with transplanted organs.  Most pople with serious diabetes are getting  clinic dialysis or trained to do home version…. with 120,000 waiting for kidneys, and about 17,000 transplants a year there is usually a wait.  best of luck.
